name: Lloyd the Monkey
description:
Lloyd the Monkey, after a year of exclusivity on Sonic Fan Games HQ, is now available on itch.io!

In the game, you play as Lloyd, a monkey trained in sword-fighting, as he travels the world in search of the gorillas who kidnapped his friends. As you get closer to the enemy base, a thrilling secret becomes unraveled before your eyes and you won't want to miss one heart pounding moment.

Staff

Original Concept, Design, Program, Art, Story, Japanese Localization: Noah Meyer

Music: Hunter Lobdell
